overview:
Shen Heng is the Founder & Managing Director of H1Studio and Jorbb.com.

His multi-disciplinary roles since 2000 at H1Studio (Founder/Creative Director) at Singapore Polytechnic (Lecturer, Interior Design, at a Research & Innovation Centre - Centre for Experience Design (Centre Manger) and recently at Procter & Gamble (Virtual Solutions Adoption Manager for AAI) have involved him in a wide range of initiatives covering all avenues of creative design. He also manages 100for100 Web Hosting, a hosting service and RPWorkshop, a render farm and rapid prototyping service.

Although he was educated as an Architect, his training has allowed him to venture into other areas such as Interactive and Digital Media Technologies. H1Studio provides solutions in 3D Visualisation, Web Development, Interactive Design, and Augmented Reality.
